library(tidyverse)

library(broom)
library(magrittr)
library(kableExtra)
library(car)

```{r data}
knowledge <- read_csv("FiscalPolicy.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```

### (a)

```{r part_a}
knowledge %$% 
  lm(spend_unemp ~ knowledge_index2) %>% 
  tidy()

knowledge %$% 
  lm(tax_unemp_correct ~ knowledge_index2) %>% 
  tidy()
```

### (b)

```{r part_b}
knowledge %$% 
  lm(spend_unemp ~ knowledge_index2 + gop) %>% 
  tidy()

knowledge %$% 
  lm(tax_unemp_correct ~ knowledge_index2 + gop) %>% 
  tidy()
```


### (c)

```{r part_c}
knowledge %$% 
  lm(spend_unemp ~ knowledge_index2*gop) %>% 
  tidy()

knowledge %$% 
  lm(tax_unemp_correct ~ knowledge_index2*gop) %>% 
  tidy()
```
